Song.title: Thank You for the Cross
Song.copyright: Katherine Scott and Brian Doerksen (c) 2007 Vertical Worship Songs

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: A | B | C#M7 :||]
VERSE 1: [A]Long before the [B]world’s creation [E] You chose a people for Yourself You [A]knew the times an[F#M7]d places we’d be [E]born [F#M7] Though we chose sin’s [B]separation [E] You already had a plan To [A]reconcile Your ch[F#M7]ildren through the [E]cross
PRE- CHOR: [F#M7]Look the Lamb of [E/G#]God who [A]takes away our sins
CHORUS: [E]Thank you, thank you For Your [A]love has saved us Jesus, th[E]ank you, th[B]ank you for the cr[A]oss With our [E]hearts on fire and our h[A]ands raised high We’re singing t[E]hank you, t[B]hank you for the [A]cross [C#M7]Thank you, th[B]ank you for the [E]cross
{new_page} VERSE 2: [A]Yours the life that t[B]ransformed hist’ry [E] Yours the truth that sets us free We st[A]and before you n[F#M7]ow on holy gr[E]ound [F#M7] Overshadowed b[B]y your glory [E] Held in everlasting arms Your li[A]fe and death turne[F#M7]d ev’rything arou[E]nd
PRE- CHOR: [F#M7]Look the Lamb of [E/G#]God who [A]takes away our sins
CHORUS: [E]Thank you, thank you For Your [A]love has saved us Jesus, th[E]ank you, th[B]ank you for the cr[A]oss With our [E]hearts on fire and our h[A]ands raised high We’re singing t[E]hank you, t[B]hank you for the [A]cross [C#M7]Thank you, th[B]ank you for the [E]cross
INTERLUDE: [||: A | B | C#m7 | C#m7 :|| (2X)]
BRIDGE: [A] You have rescued us[B], bought us with your bl[C#M7]ood Thank you for the cross (4x)
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 long before the worlds creation you chose a people for yourself you knew the times and places wed be born though we chose sins separation you already had a plan to reconcile your children through the cross pre chor look the lamb of god who takes away our sins chorus thank you thank you for your love has saved us jesus thank you thank you for the cross with our hearts on fire and our hands raised high were singing thank you thank you for the cross thank you thank you for the cross verse 2 yours the life that transformed histry yours the truth that sets us free we stand before you now on holy ground overshadowed by your glory held in everlasting arms your life and death turned evrything around pre chor look the lamb of god who takes away our sins chorus thank you thank you for your love has saved us jesus thank you thank you for the cross with our hearts on fire and our hands raised high were singing thank you thank you for the cross thank you thank you for the cross interlude bridge you have rescued us bought us with your blood thank you for the cross 4x
